description.raw:
Since not all packages are living in ros-shadow the ros stable repo should be also installed when using shadow or shadow-fixed.

Failing here: 

![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=subt-ci-default-bionic-amd64&build=109)
[https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/subt-ci-default-bionic-amd64/109/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/subt-ci-default-bionic-amd64/109/))

Fixed:

![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=subt-ci-default-bionic-amd64&build=110)
[https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/subt-ci-default-bionic-amd64/110/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/subt-ci-default-bionic-amd64/110/))
